pillbox.title: Pillbox
privacy.section1.content: MediTime is a web application designed to facilitate the management of medication treatments. It allows users to create personalized calendars, receive reminders, and share schedules with loved ones or healthcare professionals. The project is developed personally by Matis Gillet (alias mtx_26), with no commercial purpose.
privacy.section1.title: 1. Who are we?
privacy.section2.personal_data.email: Email, name, photo: via authentication (Supabase Auth).
privacy.section2.personal_data.title: Personal data
privacy.section2.personal_data.uid: Unique identifier: automatically generated for each user.
privacy.section2.tech_data.device: Device and browser information (for debugging and anonymized statistics).
privacy.section2.tech_data.title: Technical data
privacy.section2.title: 2. What data is collected?
privacy.section2.treatment_data.boxes: Information on the boxes (quantity, stock, packaging).
privacy.section2.treatment_data.medicine: Drug names, dosages, frequencies, times of taking.
privacy.section2.treatment_data.title: Data related to processing
privacy.section3.no_ads: No data is sold, shared or used for advertising purposes.
privacy.section3.reminders: Send reminders or alerts if the user has enabled notifications.
privacy.section3.sharing: Allow secure sharing with other users.
privacy.section3.stability: Improve the stability and security of the application.
privacy.section3.title: 3. How is this data used?
privacy.section4.firebase: Firebase (only for push notifications and anonymous statistics).
privacy.section4.location: The databases are located in the European Union or in GDPR compliant areas.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Where is the data stored?
privacy.section5.auth: Access to data is protected by authentication.
privacy.section5.encryption: All calendar sharing is encrypted and user-controlled.
privacy.section5.passwords: Identifiers are never visible or stored in clear text.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Sharing and security
privacy.section6.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you can at any time:
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your rights
privacy.section7.title: 7. Contact
privacy.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äì MediTime

terms.section1.p1: The purpose of these conditions is to define the terms of use of the MediTime application, developed personally by Matis Gillet (alias mtx_26), without profit motive.
terms.section1.p2: By using the application, you unconditionally accept these conditions.
terms.section1.title: 1. Purpose
terms.section2.disclaimer: The Application is provided ‚Äúas is‚Äù with no guarantee of continued availability or medical accuracy.
terms.section2.list.item3: Share calendars with other people (links or accounts).
terms.section2.title: 2. Functionality
terms.section3.conclusion: Each user is responsible for the confidentiality of their account and data.
terms.section3.list.item2: Acceptance of these T&Cs and the privacy policy.
terms.section3.title: 3. Access and registration
terms.section4.content: The source code, design, and content of MediTime are the property of Matis Gillet, unless otherwise stated. Any reproduction, distribution, or modification without authorization is prohibited.
terms.section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
terms.section5.list.item3: From loss or disclosure of data due to unsecured use.
terms.section5.p1: The application is not intended to replace medical advice. The user remains solely responsible for the use of the information displayed.
terms.section5.p2: Under no circumstances can MediTime or its developer be held responsible:
terms.section5.title: 5. Responsibilities
terms.section6.conclusion: The deletion is final and cannot be undone.

testimonials.author: Andr√©e C. and her grandchildren
testimonials.quote: I still refill my mom's pill box every week, but with MediTime, it's become much simpler. I can see her entire medication list at a glance, I receive reminders, and so does she. We're much more relaxed.
testimonials.title: They trust us
verify_email.instructions: Send a new verification link to your email address.
verify_email.title: Email address verification
why.desc: Because healthcare doesn't leave room for improvisation. MediTime offers you a clear, intuitive, and secure solution for tracking your treatments and those of your loved ones, day after day.
why.title: Why choose MediTime?
